description: For network communications, [OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0352) loads a dynamic library (`.dylib` file) using `dlopen()` and obtains a function pointer to execute within that shared library using `dlsym()`.(Citation: Unit42 OceanLotus 2017)

external_references.description: Erye Hernandez and Danny Tsechansky. (2017, June 22). The New and Improved macOS Backdoor from OceanLotus. Retrieved September 8, 2023.
